code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext}from"react";import{Router,Route,BrowserRouter,Routes}from"react-router-dom";import Landing from"./pages/Landing";import Alerts from"./context/Alerts";import Success from"./context/Success";import User from"./context/User";import Main from"./pages/Main";import{ThemeContext}from"./context/Theme";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const savedTheme=localStorage.getItem("theme");const[cookie,setCookie]=useState(localStorage.getItem("cookie"));const[theme,setTheme]=useContext(ThemeContext);const handleCoookie=()=>{setCookie("allowed");localStorage.setItem("cookie","allowed");};const toggleTheme=()=>{setTheme(theme==="night"?"fantasy":"night");};useEffect(()=>{document.querySelector("html").setAttribute("data-theme",theme);if(cookie==="allowed")localStorage.setItem("theme",theme);},[theme]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrowserRouter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(User,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alerts,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Success,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{index:true,element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Landing,{cookie:cookie,theme:theme,toggleTheme:toggleTheme,handleCoookie:handleCoookie})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/app",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Main,{theme:theme,toggleTheme:toggleTheme})})]})})})})});}export default App;
